modeSelection.title: Partnership Conversation after Moeller
modeSelection.subtitle: Choose a conversation mode
modeSelection.description: A neutral, impartial app that guides the structured conversation format

session.cooldownInstruction: Take a moment to reflect. No further discussion about the topics discussed.

sequenceBuilder.title: Custom Mode Builder
sequenceBuilder.invalidConfig: Invalid configuration: must have at least one A slot and one B slot

prepTips.breathing: Take a deep breath and center yourself.
prepTips.intention: Set an intention for this conversation.
prepTips.openMind: Approach with an open mind and heart.

transitionTips.switchFocus: Gently shift your attention to your partner's experience.
transitionTips.listenDeeply: Listen not just to respond, but to understand.
transitionTips.breathe: Take a breath before you begin speaking.

cooldownTips.reflect: Take time to reflect on the conversation.
cooldownTips.appreciate: Appreciate the time you spent together.
cooldownTips.integrate: Allow what emerged to integrate internally.
